Text:
Information about the film
Title: Christmas Tree / Christmas Tree
Original title: Christmas Tree / Christmas Tree
Released: 2010
Genre: Comedy
Director: Timur Bekmambetov, Alexander Voitinsky, Dmitri Kiselev
Cast: Sergei Svetlakov Vera Brezhnev, Catherine Vilkova, Artur Smolyaninov, Sergei Garmash, Ivan Urgant, Victor Verzhbitsky

About movie:
Events most New Year's Comedy Christmas trees come in 11 cities: Kaliningrad, Kazan, Perm, Ufa, Bavly, Ekaterinburg, Krasnoyarsk, Yakutsk, Novosibirsk, St. Petersburg and Moscow. Heroes the film - a taxi driver and a pop diva, businessman and actor, snowboarder and skier, student and retired firefighter and the headmistress, a thief and a policeman, guest worker and President of Russia. All of them are in the best New Year's Eve in a very difficult situation, out of which they will need a miracle ... or six handshakes theory according to which every person on earth knows of another six acquaintances.
